welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Newport East! This charming city is known for its stunning coastal views, historic landmarks, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and discover all that Newport East has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is primarily used for domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal by a shuttle service.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at T. F. Green Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Block Island Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westerly State Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westerly State Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
